title: Finance Magnates Awards' Finalists Revealed!
text:
Print This Post 
We are proud to present you with the finalists of the Finance Magnates Awards, as chosen by you, the trading public. 
The Finance Magnates London Summit is the most prestigious event in the trading industry , with a wealth of connections to be made and business opportunities to be grabbed. There’s plenty to interest you, from the networking session and exhibitions, to the panels and keynote speeches . 
With such a trading-focused event, what better way to crown the event than with the only peer-decided industry awards in the trading world? 
As we have explained, the Finance Magnates Awards are the only such event in the trading industry, where people from the industry anonymously vote for their favorite company in each category. 
All attendees have received emails asking them to vote.. and now the votes are in! Hundreds of attendees have spoken, we’ve counted the results, and we can now present you with the shortlists. 
As displayed in our infographic below, there are eight categories with three finalists each. These shortlisted companies have been chosen by the trading industry itself, so making it to the shortlist is a great feat. But now we must move on to the second stage. 
So, what’s next? 
Now for the second stage. Once again, all attendees will vote, and thus the winners will be decided- democratically, as it should be. The winners will be announced at the Finance Magnates Awards ceremony at the London Summit- don’t miss it? 
Please note, that you are welcome to vote in the second stage even if you didn’t participate in the first. 
The honor of standing on the podium at the apex of the London Summit is a great achievement. Vote now and make your voice heard. Got a news tip? Let Us Know FOUND A MISTAKE
